pageProduct.name: Scholl In Balance Ball of Foot & Arch Orthotic Insole Small
pageProduct.description:
Information

YOUR FEET COULD BE THE SOURCE OF YOUR PAIN

A flattening arch and high pressure on the ball of the foot often lead to foot pain. In-Balance Arch has gentle arch support to reduce the pressure caused by a flattening arch and provides a cushioning dome to support the rear part of the toes.

Key features

Shock Absorption

Feet feel shocks with every step. Unique Scholl gel immediately helps absorb shocks that can radiate up through your lower body.

Pressure Redistribution

Your feet carry up to 500 tonnes of pressure throughout the day! When that weight isn't spread evenly, it can lead to painful high-pressure areas. In-Balance Orthotic Insoles contour to your feet and spread weight more evenly, for scientifically tested pressure relief.

Stabilisation

Misalignment of your foot position can lead to unnatural walking motions. This causes stress to your feet, which can move up your body and result in knee, hip, or lower back pain. In-Balance Orthotic Insoles help to stabilise the position of your feet to support your natural walking style.

Dedicated Pressure Relief

Metatarsal dome designed to relieve pressure under the ball of foot area to help alleviate foot pain. Gentle arch support to relieve stress caused by flattening arch or being on your feet all day.

General Information

Scholl In-balance Arch Orthotic Insole reduces pressure caused by a flattening arch.

The range of Scholl In-Balance® Pain Relief Insoles work in 3 ways:

1.            Immediately help to absorb stress-inducing shock through the lower body

2.            Contour to the feet to spread your weight more evenly and reduce pressure

3.            Help to stabilize the position of your foot to support your natural walking style


How does it Work?

Metatarsal dome designed to cushion under the ball of foot area

Gentle arch support to help relieve stress caused by flattening arch or being on your feet all day.

Suitable For: Small Size 4.5 - 6.5

Boxed Contents: 1 pair of Arch Orthotic Insole.

Size: 1 Pack

KEY FEATURES

• Pressure redistribution and shock absorption
• Cushion under ball of foot area
• Relieves Stress caused by flattening arch
• Fits most shoe types
• Supports stabilisation of the foot

Warnings

All of our orthotic insoles have a Motion Control Structure: The right shape and combination of materials to provide extra support to specific areas of the foot.

Directions

Before usage, make sure the product fits well in the shoe. The end of the insole should sit at the base of the toes, this may result in the insole not touching the back of the shoe.

For some people, orthotic insoles may take time to feel comfortable. Feet need to get used to the structural properties of the insole, so a break in period may be necessary. If needed, build use gradually by wearing the In-Balance Orthotic Insoles for an increasing number of hours each day until you can wear them all day.

If pain persists, discontinue use and consult a professional for advice.

USAGE ADVICE

Size Guide:
Insole Size on Pack
Small: 4.5-6.5 (Aus Men shoe size)
Medium: 7-8.5 (Aus Men shoe size)
Large: 9-11 (Aus Men shoe size)

Insoles Size on Pack
Small: 6.5-8.5 (Aus Women shoe size)
Medium: 9-10.5 (Aus Women shoe size)
Large: 11-13 (Aus Women shoe size)

Only as guidance for fit in shoe, as depending on shoe design fit may vary.
